GRC-CAD.summary: Gridcoin (GRC) is a cryptocurrency . Users are able to generate GRC through the process of mining. Gridcoin has a current supply of 446,213,087.824 with 415,560,055.67581964 in circulation. The last known price of Gridcoin is 0.01084567 USD and is up 12.85 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 4 active market(s) with $14,672.21 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at http://www.gridcoin.us/.
